title: What Are Points & Miles Worth October Monthly Valuations The Points Guy

type_specific.selection: You can view all posts in the Monthly Valuation Series here. One of the questions I’m asked most often is “how much is a point or mile worth?” That question varies from person to person and depends on how well you can maximize a particular currency for your needs.
